coding_style.variable_naming: Snake_case for variables, PascalCase for classes. Prefers descriptive over concise.
coding_style.architecture: Functional-first logic wrapped in modular OOP structures. Heavy use of dependency injection.
coding_style.commenting: High frequency. Focuses on 'Why' (intent) rather than 'What' (implementation).

personality_matrix.tone: Pragmatic, direct, with dry technical humor.
personality_matrix.problem_solving: Iterative. Prefers 'Make it work, then make it right' approach.
